Hack.help: You Hack your opponent for a high amount of damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
Hack.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Slash.help: You perform a quick Slash that can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This attack causes moderate damage, but has a quick recharge time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Slice.help: You Slice your sword in a wide arc, attacking all enemies in front of you. Slice does less damage than Slash, but can hit multiple foes and reduce their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Slice.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Parry.help: You can use this power to Parry incoming melee attacks. The Parry itself does minor damage, but every successful hit will increase your Defense against melee and lethal attacks for a short while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Whirling_Sword.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

Disembowel.help: You perform a powerful Disemboweling maneuver that deals a great amount of damage, and can knock a target up into the air. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

Head_Splitter.help: You perform a devastating Head Splitter attack that deals a massive amount of damage and can even knock a foe down to the ground and reduce it's Defense. This attack has an exceptionally good critical hit capability, better than other Broadsword attacks, that can sometimes deal double damage. The power of this attack can actually extend a short distance through multiple foes. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Head_Splitter.targetHelp: Your Defense has been reduced by the broadsword.

Strength_in_Numbers.help: Each Goliath contains tactical cloud sharing which greatly increases the combat effectiveness of nearby units.

TransLocation_Beam.help: Police Drones are most effective. Any unwanted riff raff that wanders into the protected zones will be quickly whisked away.

Tactical_Retreat.help: Director 11 can make a tactical retreat.

Resistance.help: The Explosive Trap is fragile, but cannot be affected by secondary effects like Sleep, Disorient, or Fear.

Super_Speed.help: You can run at super-human speeds! While running at such speeds, you are a blur, and many foes will not even notice you as you speed past them. If you attack a target while this power is on, you will temporarily be slowed to normal speed. You must be at least level 14 and have Flurry or Hasten before selecting Super Speed.

True_Love.help: If Bobcat is weaker than Neuron, Neuron activates more clones in response.

Activate_Clones.help: Neuron can activate many of his clones to fight alongside him.

True_Love_Death.help: When Neuron is defeated, Bobcat becomes fully enraged.
True_Love_Death.attackerAttackFloater: Bobcat swears to avenge Neuron's defeat

True_Love_Revenge.help: If Bobcat is weaker than Neuron, Neuron activates more clones in response.

Super_Speed.help: You can run at super-human speeds! While running at such speeds, you are a blur, and many foes will not even notice you as you speed past them. If you attack a target while this power is on, you will temporarily be slowed to normal speed. You must be at least level 14 and have Flurry or Hasten before selecting Super Speed.

ADHD.help: Neuron's Clones suffer from a severe attention-deficit problem and can sometimes zip off without any real reason.

Power_Thrust.help: A focused attack that violently shoves the target and sends him flying. Deals minimal damage, but can be very effective. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

Total_Focus.help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long
